About Me

BIO

Hello! I am Devan Comes, a high schooler interested in Data Science, Game Dev and all things tech. My hobbies are coding, reading, playing tennis, video games and learning! This websites shows my projects insofar. I also have experience with technologies such as soldering, Arduino, Raspberry Pi and TensorFlow / Keras.

Please see my resume here.

Python

I am fairly proficient in Python. Applications of Python so far are: keras, tensorflow, data visualization, pandas, and the std library of Python.

Machine Learning

I am somewhat proficient in Machine Learning. I started out learning the Calculus and Linear Algebra behind ML concepts and then moved onto Regression. This was followed by Deep Learning and now Computer Vision.

Game Dev

I am proficient in Game Dev. This is due to my experience with the Unity game engine. I have created multiple small polished projects in Unity.
